text:
Munich (GER) | ONSITE | Fulltime

* Big Data Architect (IoT platform)- https://goo.gl/2hmjo7 * Embedded Engineer - https://goo.gl/J5kEX1

| blik - https://www.blik.io - Taking part in Techstars IoT Accelerator, New York |

Our customers are BMW, Volkswagen and Bosch and we want to make their entire flow of goods of hundreds of thousands of items visible in real time. Our solution combines Hard- and Software to enable a fully transparent supply-chain around the entire world.

Contact us through talent@blik.io
